sub_title: Executive in Energy Sector | Head of Corporate Governance | Head of Legal & Compliance |  Inspiring Leader
summary:
For the last 5 years I am manager in the energy sector. Now I am Head of Corporate Governance of DTEK Group. 

Before this appointment I was responsible for the legal function of the electricity distribution business, its regulatory and anti-corruption compliance. I also took care to ensure that land under newly-built power facilities is allotted quickly and in time, and these newly-built power facilities receive title deeds. But that`s not all I did for the company. Throughout my work at DTEK GRIDS, I have built business processes from scratch and implemented projects that bring DTEK GRIDS closer to the international standarts of grid companies. My contribution is that DTEK GRIDS has successfully completed and complies with international standarts of unbundling. My thesis project on Executive MBA program was also aimed at developing an innovative solution that allows predictive control of the voltage in the grid to provide our customers with stable voltage in their homes.      

Our electricity distribution business consist of 7 operating companies (distribution system operators in Dnepropetrovsk, Donetsk, Odessa, Kyiv regions and the city of Kyiv) and 2 service companies. Thus, I ensure its sustainability through membership in the Supervisory Boards, Risk & Finance Committee, Purchasing Commission. I am also inspiring leader of the team numbering more than 150 people.     

Before I joined the DTEK GRIDS management team, I was corporate governace manager in DTEK Headquarters. I have 6 years of experience in building and administration of different corporate governance models in Ukrainian, Russian, British, Dutch, Swiss, Cyprus companies. I know how to establish company and create its governance system from scratch. I can share my experience of using golden shares, joint venture, M&A and other instruments of corporate structuring. I can confidently say that I am a high-class professional in the field of corporate governace of multy-national holdings. 

I have 14 years of legal experience in Banking, Corporate Finance, Corporate Governance, listing on Stock Exchanges (London, Irish), Contract law, M&A, Litigations, Energy Law, etc. My experience in the private banking sector has shaped my systemic and analytical thinking skills and sparked an interest in companies that create real value for society. This served as an impetus in my further career  and formed the basic principles of work and networking.

profile_positions.title: Director
Head of Legal & Compliance, Head of Land & Property, Supervisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities: 
• Administration of non-resident companies of DTEK Group; • Creation of companies and its management systems around the world, including with external stakeholders; • Corporate support of the corporate finance projects, including loan and eurobonds restructuring; • Coordination of insider information disclosure process on main markets of LSE and ISE, insider trading and insider dealing control; • Maintenance UBO’s shares and corporate rights protection process; • Corporate due diligence of DTEK group companies. 
Achievements:
• Building corporate governance model of DTEK Russian assets from the ground up taking into account external stakeholder membership in the Board of Directors; • Arrangement of issuing the «golden» share by one DTEK company in Cyprus; • Arrangement of shareholders meetings (in absentia and in presentia), supervisory board meetings of DTEK British and Dutch companies; • Successful corporate support of Eurobond issuing in December 2016 and Eurobond cancellation of 2013 and 2015 issue period; • Successful corporate support of projects concerning DTEK long-term debt restructuring; • Development of new DTEK ERM structure.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Governance Manager, Corporate Secretary of HSE Committees

profile_positions.description:
Functional duties:
• Creation governance system of DTEK Group non-resident companies (charters drafting and registration, governing bodies registration, issuance of corporate resolutions and PoAs etc.); • Corporate Secratary at DTEK Ukrainian assets; • Large-scale financial projects support (syndicated lending, project financing, debt group restructuring); • Arrangement of information disclosure within DTEK listing on the main markets of LSE and ISE; information disclosure support on Interfax website (Russian Federation) regarding DTEK Russian assets.

Achievements:
• Establishment of 2 sub-holding companies of DTEK Group in Netherlands for the purpose of division traditional DTEK business from oil&gas and alternative energy resources businesses within the project of DTEK group restructuring in 2014. As part of this project: foundation of Supervisory boards with independent directors within the companies, support of transfer of DTEK companies’ corporate rights/shares in favour of new sub-holdings; • Drafting and registration of charters for DTEK British and Russian companies in order to implement a new corporate governance model; • Successful corporate support of the project regarding DTEK group loan restructuring, as well as major financial transactions of DTEK group (PXF, project financing to build 1st and 2nd lines of WPP, syndicated lending – Club Loan); • COMI Shift realization (center of main interest shift) of the Dutch company from the Netherlands to Great Britain for the purpose of the new DTEK Eurobond issue in 2015. • Building from scratch the system of compliance by DTEK Group companies of ongoing obligations on LSE and ISE.
profile_positions.title: Senior Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description:
Functional duties:
• Drafting the agreements, verification of authorities of parties’ representatives according to the signed agreements; • Pledge registration and pledge information removal from the State Registries of mortgages; • Provision of legal opinion on possibility of bank loans, warranties and other transactions execution, verification of legal opinions provided by legal officers from low-level braches; • Banks’ interests representation before the courts, law enforcement authorities, regulatory agencies, state enforcement services, notaries, technical inventory bureau, conduct of claim-related activity; • Drafting minutes of annual shareholders’ meeting, supervisory boards of Ukrainian corporate clients, eligibility control of holding GSM/GMP/SB meetings of corporate clients; • Dealing with corporate clients securities (execution of share pledge agreement, investment security certificates, transaction legal support regarding pledged securities resale, elaboration of a resale scheme etc.); • Legal support for bank departments and branches restructuring.

Achievements:
• Successful project support regarding financing one of the biggest industrial groups in Ukraine for a total amount of 3-4 milliards UAH, consisting of 40 agreements, cross-suretyships, pledges and guaranties included; • Successful project support regarding liquidation of the bank branches and non-accounting branches in Donetsk region; • Development and scheme implementation concerning securities resale of large Donetsk construction company, pledged by the bank; • One hundred percent of won lawsuits.
